intro: Paxiodendron, commonly known as the desert willow, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Bignoniaceae. Its leaves are opposite, simple, and often have a rough texture, adapting to conserve water in harsh conditions. Paxiodendron is well-suited for xeriscaping due to its drought tolerance and ornamental value.
